name: RhymingGame
0:
”Alexa, ask rhyming game to start a normal game”
”start a timed game”
”help me”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: rhyming game
des:
The brand new game putting your rhyming abilities to the test! Great for younger tykes first learning their words, and grown people looking for a challenge! All the words are one syllable long, making it easy and fast paced for people of all ages.

"Alexa, ask rhyming game to start a [normal/timed] game."

After starting either a normal or timed game, Alexa will give you a word you have to give a rhyme to. To submit your word, say "try" followed by your word. If you didn't hear it correctly or want it spelled, say "can you repeat that?". A normal game sees how long you can go without reusing rhyming words, or saying a word that doesn't rhyme. A timed game sees how many you can rhyme in 60 seconds!

If you have fun make sure to leave a review! 

And if you need anymore help, say "Alexa, ask rhyming game for help." If Alexa stops listening, say "Alexa, ask rhyming game", followed by your prompt.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
